name: places/ChIJfR8B8OFYwokRL13NhiiUdRo
formattedAddress: 17 Beekman Pl, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 17 Beekman Pl, New York, NY 10022-8003, USA

originalText.text:
Something is so very sketchy and scammy here,
They reject all applicants for Schengen  tourist visas.
If you are visa shopping or got an easier appointment here forget about it.
Also I think they only approve visas for white people or British like , other skin tones get rejected always.
Luxembourg is a very small country.
They only approve if you have letter from family living in Luxembourg.
Please do not apply for Schengen visa here as it is all about collecting the money and rejecting the application.
Something is very very suspicious about this place.
They had no valid reason to reject my application .
They will say intent to stay is not justified. We provided all the proof.
Never apply Schengen visa here. Also I have heard a lot of people having this problem.
This is based on my personal experience here. Never expected this.

originalText.text:
Neither did they submit my wife's application for short stay tourist visa, they also lost her foreign passport, money order, bank statements.
They said they'd shipped everything back to me later that same day I went to embassy.
Their operations seems very sketchy and suspicious. It's either them or FedEx is involve or both of them.
The rep's name was pronounced: Ally & supervisor Daniela if I'm not mistaken.
Not only I am loosing all money in pre planned trips but also fear for identity theft now. I am filing for police report.
My suggestion is if you do go to them please pick up your own passport.

originalText.text: As a PR holder I applied multi entry visa for one year to visit my sister and I got single entry visa with staying up to five days. waste of time and money had to cancel the trip since I feel the pressure and restrictions Europe’s bureaucracy is here.

originalText.text:
Laetitia - You we wonderful and so helpful. I haven't meet any other people from any office that have been helpful this much like you are. Commendable job and incredible good person.

Thank you very very very much and much appreciate your work.

originalText.text: Lovely people, who are helpful, kind and fast -- all in a lovely waterfront town-house  :)
